explains: adj. 独裁主义的；权力主义的
n. 权力主义者；独裁主义者

sentences.cn: 父亲是个严厉的专制主义者。

sentences.en: Mr Erdogan's authoritarian bent and his quarrels with the secular press did not help.
sentences.cn: 埃尔多安的威权作风以及他与世俗派媒体的争吵对于选举来说没有帮助。

sentences.en: In the early stage, the middle class sides with an authoritarian regime because they want to maintain social stability.
sentences.cn: 早期的中产阶级支持掌权者的统治，因为他们想保持社会稳定。
